Verses: 1 karththar Moseyai Nokki:
2 sabaiyaik Koodivaravazhaippadharkum Paalayangalaip Prayaanappaduththuvadharkum Ubayogamaaga Irandu Vellippoorikaigalai Seydhukolvaayaaga; Avaigal Ore Velliththagattaal Seyyappadavendum.
3 avaigalai Oodhumpodhu, Sabaiyaarellaarum Aasarippuk Koodaaravaasalil Unnidaththil Koodivaravendum.
4 ondraimaaththiram Oodhinaal Isravelil Aayiravargalukkuth Thalaivaraagiya Prabukkal Unnidaththil Koodivarakkadavargal.
5 neengal Avaigalaip Perundhoniyaai Muzhakkumpodhu, Kizhakke Irangiyirukkira Paalayangal Prayaanappadakkadavadhu.
6 avaigalai Neengal Irandaandharam Perundhoniyaai Muzhakkumpodhu, Therke Irangiyirukkira Paalayangal Prayaanappadakkadavadhu; Avargalaip Prayaanappaduththuvadharkup Perundhoniyaai Muzhakkavendum.
7 sabaiyaik Koottugiradharku Neengal Oodhavendiyadheyandri Perundhoniyaai Muzhakkavendaam.
8 aaronin Kumaararaagiya Aasaariyar Poorikaigalai Oodhakkadavargal; Ungal Thalaimuraidhorum Idhu Ungalukku Niththiya Kattalaiyaayirukkakkadavadhu.

9 ungal Dhesaththil Ungalaith Thunbappaduththugira Saththuruvukku Virodhamaaga Yuththaththukkup Pogumpodhu, Poorikaigalaip Perundhoniyaai Muzhakkakkadaveergal; Appozhudhu Ungal Dhevanaagiya Karththarudaiya Samugaththile Neengal Ninaivukoorappattu, Ungal Pagaignarukku Neengalaaki Ratchikkappaduveergal.

10 ungal Magizhchchiyin Naalilum, Ungal Pandigaigalilum, Maadhappirappugalilum, Ungal Sarvaanga Thaganapaligalum Samaadhaanapaligalum Seluththappadumpodhu Poorikaigalai Oodhavendum; Appozhudhu Avaigal Ungal Dhevanudaiya Samugaththil Ungalukku Gnaabagakkuriyaayikkum; Naan Ungal Dhevanaagiya Karththar Endraar.
11 irandaam Varusham Irandaam Maadham Irubadhaam Thedhiyil Megam Saatchiyinudaiya Vaasasthalaththin Meedhilirundhu Uyara Ezhumbitru.
12 appozhudhu Isravel Puththirar Seenaai Vanaandharaththilirundhu Thangal Prayaana Varisaigalaaip Purappattaargal; Megam Baaraan Vanaandharaththil Thangitru.
13 ippadiye Karththar Moseyaikkondu Kattalaiyittapadi Mudhal Prayaanampanninaargal.
14 yoodhaa Sandhadhiyaarudaiya Paalayaththin Kodi Avargal Senaigalode Mudhal Purappattadhu; Avanudaiya Senaikku Amminadhaapin Kumaaran Nakason Thalaivanaayirundhaan.
15 isakkaar Sandhadhiyaarudaiya Koththiraththin Senaikku Soovaarin Kumaaran Nedhaneyel Thalaivanaayirundhaan.
16 sepulon Sandhadhiyaarudaiya Koththiraththin Senaikku Elonin Kumaaran Eliyaap Thalaivanaayirundhaan.
17 appozhudhu Vaasasthalam Irakkivaikkappattadhu; Adhaik Kerson Puththirarum Meraari Puththirarum Sumandhukondu Purappattaargal.
18 adharkupinbu Rooban Sandhadhiyaarudaiya Paalayaththin Kodi Avargal Senaigalode Purappattadhu; Avanudaiya Senaikku Sedheyoorin Kumaaran Elisoor Thalaivanaayirundhaan.
19 simiyon Sandhadhiyaarudaiya Koththiraththin Senaikku Soorishadhaayin Kumaaran Seloomiyel Thalaivanaayirundhaan.
20 kaadh Sandhadhiyaarudaiya Koththiraththin Senaikkuth Thekuvelin Kumaaran Eliyaasaap Thalaivanaayirundhaan.
21 kokaaththiyar Parisuththamaanavaigalai Sumandhukondu Purappattaargal; Ivargal Vandhu Serumun Matravargal Vaasasthalaththai Sthaabanampannuvaargal.
22 adharkuppinbu, Eppraayeem Sandhadhiyaarudaiya Paalayaththin Kodi Avargal Senaigalode Purappattadhu; Avanudaiya Senaikku Ammiyoodhin Kumaaran Elishaamaa Thalaivanaayirundhaan.
23 manaase Sandhadhiyaarudaiya Koththiraththin Senaikkup Pedhaasoorin Kumaaran Kamaaliyel Thalaivanaayirundhaan.
24 benyameen Sandhadhiyaarudaiya Koththiraththin Senaikkuk Keedheyonin Kumaaran Apeedhaan Thalaivanaayirundhaan.

25 adharkuppinbu, Thaan Sandhadhiyaarudaiya Paalayaththin Kodi Sagala Paalayangalukkum Pinnaaga Avargal Senaigalode Purappattadhu; Avanudaiya Senaikku Ammishadhaayin Kumaaran Akiyeser Thalaivanaayirundhaan.
26 aaser Sandhadhiyaarudaiya Koththiraththin Senaikku Ogiraanin Kumaaran Paakiyel Thalaivanaayirundhaan.
27 napthali Sandhadhiyaarudaiya Koththiraththin Senaikku Enaanin Kumaaran Akeeraa Thalaivanaayirundhaan.
28 isravel Puththirar Purappattapodhu, Ivvidhamaaith Thangal Thangal Senaigalinpadiye Prayaanampanninaargal.

29 appozhudhu Mose Than Maamanaagiya Rekuvel Ennum Meedhiyaananudaiya Kumaaranaana Opaavai Nokki: Ungalukkuth Tharuven Endru Karththar Sonna Sthalaththukku Naangal Prayaanampogirom; Neeyum Engalodekooda Vaa, Unakku Nanmaiseyvom; Karththar Isravelukku Nalla Vaakkuththaththam Panniyirukkiraar Endraan.
30 adharku Avan: Naan Varak Koodaadhu; En Dhesaththukkum En Inaththaaridaththukkum Pogavendum Endraan.
31 appozhudhu Mose: Nee Engalaivittup Pogavendaam; Vanaandharaththile Naangal Paalayamirangum Idangalai Nee Arindhirukkirapadiyinaal, Engalukkuk Kangalaippola Iruppaai.
32 nee Engalodekooda Vandhaal, Karththar Engalukku Seydharulum Nanmaiyinpadiye Unakkum Nanmaiseyvom Endraan.

33 avargal Karththarudaiya Parvadhaththaivittu, Moondrunaal Prayaanamponaargal; Moondrunaal Prayaanaththilum Karththarudaiya Udanpadikkaippetti Avargalukku Ilaippaarum Sthalaththaith Thedik Kaattumpadikku Avargalmun Sendradhu.
34 avargal Paalayaththilirundhu Prayaanampogirapodhu, Karththarudaiya Megam Pagalil Avargalmel Thangiyirundhadhu.
35 pettiyaanadhu Purappadumpodhu, Mose: Karththaave, Ezhundharulum, Ummudaiya Saththurukkal Sidharadikkappaduvaargalaaga; Ummaip Pagaikkiravargal Umakku Munbaaga Odippovaargalaaga Enbaan.
36 adhu Thangumpodhu: Karththaave, Anega Aayiravargalaagiya Isravelaridaththil Thirumbuveeraaga Endru Solluvaan.
